channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: RZA Celebrates 56th Birthday at Phish Show, Gets Shoutout from Band
item.description: 🎉 RZA turns up for his birthday at a Phish show and gets major love from the band! 🙌🎂 #BirthdayBash #MusicNews

item.title: Modest Mouse playing ‘The Moon & Antarctica’ in full at their Psychic Salamander fest
item.description: 🌙✨ Modest Mouse's 'The Moon & Antarctica' live at Psychic Salamander fest?! 🎶 Who's ready for this out-of-this-world experience? 🚀🎸 #ModestMouse #PsychicSalamander

item.title: Black Sabbath’s “Back to the Beginning” Concert Was Streamed by Over 5 Million Fans
item.description: 🤘 Rock on, Sabbath fans! 5 million strong for the epic "Back to the Beginning" stream! 🎸🔥 #BlackSabbath #LegendaryCapture

item.title: De La Soul and MF DOOM Star as Superheroes in New Animated Video for “Rock Co. Kane Flow”: Watch
item.description: 🦸‍♂️🎶 Superhero alert! De La Soul and MF DOOM team up in an animated adventure for "Rock Co. Kane Flow." 🚀🔥 #HipHopHeroes

item.title: BLACKPINK Debut New Song “Jump” At South Korea Tour Opener
item.description: BLACKPINK lit up the stage in Seoul with their groovy new track "Jump" 🔥🎶 Who else is loving it? #BLACKPINK #Jump #KpopTime
